title: Notwithstanding Anything contained in this UDCPR, the approval to the Low or Moderate Risk category of constructions shall be governed as per the procedure given in Appendix - K
clause_text: Notwithstanding Anything contained in this UDCPR, the approval to the Low or Moderate Risk category of constructions shall be governed as per the procedure given in Appendix - K.
section: Approval of Building Permission on Risk Based Classification
